projects.description: Gained knowledge of basic JavaScript syntax and data structures by building a Random Quote Generator, which is a program that displays a randomly selected quote each time the user clicks a button
Wrote JavaScript to display several “pages” of student data that the user can easily navigate and view.
Used my skills to enhance a form so that it’s engaging, interactive, and easy to use.
technologies: interactive forms using focus and blue listeners
incorporated functions that aid in accessibility

projects.description: Created a browser-based, word guessing game called Phrase Hunter. I used JavaScript and OOP (Object-Oriented Programming) to select a random, hidden phrase where a player has so many tries to guess the phrase by selecting individual letters from an onscreen keyboard.
technologies: instantiating classes and using class constructors

projects.description: Using JavaScript, I created an employee directory by communicating with a third-party API (Application Programming Interface).
technologies: Asynchronous Programming with JS, Fetch API
the ability to enter/exit from a modal window
